  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202624</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Surviving Those Scholarship Interviews!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Überleben Jene Gelehrsamkeit-Interviews!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Survivant Ces Entrevues de Bourse !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sobrevivendo Aquelas Entrevistas Do Scholarship!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sopravvivendo Quelle Interviste Di Borsa!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιβίωση εκείνων των συνεντεύξεων υποτροφιών!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Sobreviviendo Esas Entrevistas De la Beca!</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This activity is designed to provide an opportunity for students to practice interviewing skills. It is particularly geared toward those students who will be facing competitive scholarship interviews (Teaching Fellows, Moreheads, civic organizations, etc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Aktivität ist konzipiert, um eine Gelegenheit für 
Kursteilnehmer zu interviewenden Fähigkeiten der Praxis zur 
Verfügung zu stellen. Sie wird besonders in Richtung zu jenen 
Kursteilnehmern übersetzt, die konkurrierende Gelehrsamkeit 
interviewt gegenüberstellen werden (unterrichtende Gefährten, 
Moreheads, bürgerliche Organisationen, usw..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette activité est conçue pour présenter un moyen des 
étudiants aux qualifications interviewantes de pratique. Elle 
est en particulier adaptée vers ces étudiants qui feront face à la 
bourse concurrentielle interviewent (les camarades d'enseignement, le 
Moreheads, les organismes civiques, etc...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta atividade é projetada fornecer uma oportunidade para
estudantes às habilidades entrevistando da prática. É 
engrenada particularmente para aqueles estudantes que estarão 
enfrentando o scholarship do competidor entrevistam (companheiros 
ensinando, Moreheads, organizações civic, etc..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa attività è destinata per offrire un'occasione 
degli allievi alle abilità d'intervista di pratica. È 
innestata specialmente verso quegli allievi che affronteranno la borsa
competitiva intervistano (colleghe d'istruzione, Moreheads, 
organizzazioni civiche, ecc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η δραστηριότητα έχει ως σκοπό να παρέχει μια 
ευκαιρία για τους σπουδαστές στην πρακτική που παίρνουν 
συνέντευξη από τις δεξιότητες. Συνδέεται ιδιαίτερα προς 
εκείνους τους σπουδαστές που θα αντιμετωπίζουν τις ανταγωνιστικές 
συνεντεύξεις υποτροφιών (συνεργάτες διδασκαλίας, Moreheads, 
πολιτικές οργανώσεις, κ.λπ....</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta actividad se diseña para proporcionar a una 
oportunidad para los estudiantes a las habilidades que se entrevistan 
con de la práctica. Se engrana determinado hacia esos 
estudiantes que estén haciendo frente a beca competitiva se 
entrevisten con (los compañeros de enseñanza, Moreheads, las 
organizaciones cívicas, etc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

    </metadata>
  </description>
